SELECT p.id as id,-- 自增长ID p.org_Id as orgId,-- 组织机构ID pp.proportion_Code as proportionCode,-- 目标配合比编号 pp.id as targPropId,-- 目标配比ID ag.id as gradId,-- 级配比ID app.id as i_prodId,-- 生产配比ID isnull(p.plan_No,'') as planNo,-- 生产计划编号 isnull(CONVERT(varchar(20),p.startTime,120),'') as startTime,-- 生产计划开始时间 p.product_Id as productId,-- 产品Id p.prod_Id as prodId,-- 生产配比ID isnull(p.proj_Pos,'') as projPos,-- 工程部位/用途 isnull(p.construction_Unit,'') as constructionUnit,-- 施工单位 p.scheduled_Production as scheduledProduction,-- 计划生产量 p.isCancel as isCancel,-- 计划是否作废 p.Equ_Id as equId,-- 拌和机Id isnull(CONVERT(varchar(20),p.cancel_Time,120),'') as cancelTime,-- 作废时间 isnull(p.invalid_Person,'') as invalidPerson,-- 作废人 isnull(p.cancel_Reason,'') as cancelReason,-- 作废原因 isnull(CONVERT(varchar(20),p.create_Date,120),'') as createDate,-- 创建日期 isnull(mn.Material_Name,'') as materialName,-- 物料名称 isnull(mm.Material_Model,'') as materialModel,-- 物料型号 isnull(app.Proportion_Code,'') as proportion_Code,-- 生产配比编码 isnull(oi.org_name,'') as orgName,-- 机构名称 isnull(ei.Equipment_Name,'') as equipmentName,-- 拌和机名称 isnull(mn.Material_Name+Material_Model,'') as nameAndModel, -- 物料和型号 isnull(ag.Grade_Code,'') as gradeCode-- 级配编码 FROM Production_Plan p -- 沥青生产计划 LEFT JOIN Material_Info mi ON p.product_Id=mi.id -- 材料信息 LEFT JOIN MaterName_Info mn ON mi.MateName_ID=mn.id -- 材料名称表 LEFT JOIN MaterModel_Info mm ON mi.MateModel_ID=mm.id -- 材料型号表 LEFT JOIN Asphalt_Prod_Proportion app ON p.prod_Id=app.id -- 沥青生产配合比表 LEFT JOIN Asph_TargetProportion pp ON pp.Id = app.Targ_PropID -- 沥青目标配合比表 LEFT JOIN Organization_Info oi ON p.org_id=oi.id -- 组织机构信息 LEFT JOIN Equipment_Info ei on ei.id=Equ_ID -- 拌和设备表 LEFT JOIN Asphalt_Grading ag on p.Grad_Id=ag.id -- 沥青级配基本信息表
AND mm.material_Model LIKE '%${materialModel}%'
AND mn.material_Name LIKE '%${materialName}%'
AND p.plan_No LIKE '%${planNo}%'
AND p.org_Id = #{orgId}
AND p.valid_Flag=1 ORDER BY p.id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Production_Plan ( Org_ID, Plan_No, StartTime, Product_ID, Prod_ID, Proj_Pos, Construction_Unit, Scheduled_Production, IsCancel, Operator, Create_Date, Valid_Flag, Equ_ID, Grad_Id ) VALUES ( #{orgId}, #{planNo}, #{startTime}, #{productId}, #{prodId}, #{projPos}, #{constructionUnit}, #{scheduledProduction}, 0, #{operator}, CONVERT (VARCHAR(100), GETDATE(), 20), 1, #{equId}, #{gradId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE Production_Plan SET Plan_No = #{planNo}, StartTime = #{startTime}, Product_ID = #{productId}, Prod_ID = #{prodId}, Construction_Unit = #{constructionUnit}, Scheduled_Production = #{scheduledProduction}, IsCancel = #{isCancel}, Cancel_Time = #{cancelTime}, Invalid_Person = #{invalidPerson}, Cancel_Reason = #{cancelReason}, Modifier = #{modifier}, Modify_Date = CONVERT (VARCHAR(100), GETDATE(), 20), Equ_ID = #{equId}, Grad_Id = #{gradId}, Proj_Pos = #{projPos} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE Production_Plan SET Valid_Flag = 0 WHERE Id = #{id}
UPDATE Production_Plan SET Cancel_Reason = #{cancelReason}, IsCancel = 1 WHERE Id = #{id}
